admin.content_manager: Use the Content Manager to add articles and pages.
admin.media_manager: Use the Media Manager to upload new files to add to you pages.
admin.template_manager: Use the Template Manager to add or remove JavaScript plugins, edit CSS and HTML for the site.

content.cancel: Cancel and go back to overview.

menu.cancel: Cancel and go back to overview.

template.cancel: Cancel and return to Template Overview.

user.cancel: Cancel and return to user overview.
